Don't get me wrong, as the Archbishop of Schiscial I am very grateful to your fights and sacrifice, even under such gunfire you still won a territory, and secure the entry of the corps, I will reward you with what you deserve  after the war.
不要误会，作为天命的主教我对你们的奋战和牺牲表示由衷的感谢，即便是在这样的炮火下你们依旧夺下了一块阵地，为大部队进入要塞提供了安全保障，对于你们的贡献我会在战后给予应得的嘉奖。
誤解しないでくれたまえ。#n天命の主教として、僕は君たちの奮戦と犠牲に心から感謝を示しているんだ。#nこのような砲火の中でも君たちは陣地を奪い取り、本隊が要塞に入るための安全を確保してくれた。その貢献に対し、戦いが終わったらしかるべき褒賞を与えるつもりだよ。
오해하지 말아 줘.#n천명의 주교로서, 나는 너희들의 분전과 희생에 진심으로 감사를 표하고 있어.#n이런 포화 속에서도 너희들이 진지를 탈취하고, 본대가 요새에 들어갈 수 있도록 안전을 확보해 줬어. 그 공헌에 대해 전투가 끝나면 마땅한 포상을 해줄 생각이야.

Don't get me wrong, as the Bishop of Schicksal I thank you from the bottom of my heart for your fight and sacrifice, even under such fire you still captured a position and provided security for the main force to enter the fortress, for your contribution I will give you a well deserved commendation after the battle.

Don't get me wrong. As the Bishop of Schicksal, I am expressing my sincere appreciation for your hard work and sacrifice. Even under fire like this, you have taken positions and secured the safety of the main force as they enter the fortress. For your contribution, I intend to reward you appropriately when the battle is over.

All the Schiscial warriors! Anti-Entropy has been touching our bottom line! And Step on our holy mission! For the great and divine Schiscial vision, we need to remove all the enemy! Go aead! Bring back the honor!
诸位天命的勇士！逆熵不断试探着我们的底线！将我们神圣的使命践踏于脚下！为了天命远大而又崇高的夙愿，我们必须肃清一切敌人！前进吧！为天命带来新的荣光！

천명의 용사 제군이여!#n네겐트로피는 항상 우리의 한계를 탐구하려 해 왔다! 우리의 신성한 사명을 발로 짓밟아 온 것이다! 천명의 원대하고 숙고한 숙원을 위해, 우리는 모든 적을 숙청해야 한다! 나아가는 것이다! 천명에 새로운 영광을 가져오기 위해!

Fellow warriors of Schicksal! Anti-Entropy keeps testing our bottom line! Trampling our sacred mission underfoot! For the sake of Schicksal's great and noble dream, we must purge all enemies! Forward! Bring new glory to Schicksal!

Brave men of Schicksal! Anti-Entropy has always tried to explore our limits! We have trampled our sacred mission underfoot! For the sake of Schicksal's far-reaching and noble destiny, we must purge all our enemies! We must move on! To bring new glory to Schicksal!
